great game and a few reasons why

- fully customisable ships
- a large variety if diffrent materials to build you ship with that have diffrent qualities and strengths and weknesses
- lots of ship parts you can learn and put on your ship such as wings, engines, cannons, sky cor eupgrades, swivel shot guns and more
- a procedural ship part unlocking system everyones ship parts are unique and you must progress up the tree to get better parts "mix and match"
- a vast open world to explore
- challenges you must overtake to get to new areas such as weather walls
- ship to ship pvp is great
- if you want to be a lone wolf then you can still travel anywhere you want and build as big a ship you want if your dedicated enough and know what your doing "authough i recomend a smaller ship for solos"

one of the few problems i have with this game is that the only handheld weapon is a pistol and theirs no melle authough they plan on adding it and i also hope they add more guns

MEU DEUS, que modo história INCRIVEL, sério, um dos únicos jogos que eu nao queria zerar, comecando pelo enredo que é FANTASTICO!!!!!! Os gráficos, para um jogo de 2011, ta na média atual. A dublagem, ah essa dublagem, sem dúvidas a dublagem é incrivel, na questao da OST, baixe agora e escute ela todos os dias, eles capricharam MUITO na OST, posso dizer que é marcante, cara, Portal 2 foi um jogo que me fez rir e sentir raiva ao mesmo tempo. Os puzzles tbm sao muito legais, recomendo joga-lo logo depois de zerar o Portal 1, para voce entender todas as referencias. 100000/10 recomendo MUITO!!!!!!!

One of best-written games of all-time; make sure to play Portal 1 first!

this game might be from 2011 but its still an awesome game. The Single Player story was pretty fun and comedic as-well, same with the co-op story. 

The only two problems I found while playing was in the co-op story. No ingame mute (so have to use in-game chat or use console commands to mute each-other). 4th chapter wasnt working after completing 3rd chapter so we had to use no clip to bypass the door, which sucked that we had to do that since being an Achievement Hunter I really hate to use cheats.

even with these problems me and my friend had, its a game Totally worth buying on sale or not you will have a great time playing this game! P.S this game really looks dead and not colourful, recommend using NVIDIA game filters to make the game look colourful.

класно

啊虽然V社的游戏我只玩过传送门系列，但总能感受到某种特别的魅力、独有的味道。简简单单的传送门配上方块按钮炮塔，辅以让人眼前一亮的谜题最终绘就了一个完整世界观且引人深思的故事，不愧是你G胖

[h1]单人[/h1]
本作相比一代而言解谜工具更多了但难度不是很高，感觉更偏向剧情驱动。
一代虽然场景狭小工具少但照样能耍得我团团转，每一关解谜成功的正反馈、偶尔出现的非测试废墟场景、最后的真相和boss战协调达成了完美的共振，不愧是小而精的典范；
二代场景宏大，各种细节不断补足整个世界观，一波三折的剧情和环境变化也能不断促使玩家向前走，大概也算为传送门系列划上完美句号了吧。另外结尾boss战那枪真是神来之笔hhhh

啊顺便唠叨唠叨感想：本作出现的两个人工智能GLaDOS和wheatly一代表正确一代表错误，但某种意义上对于双方而言对方都是或不可缺的一部分。正如生物学中遗传基因的突变，短期来看确实是错误，但就种族延续而言如果少了这个错误种族的延续生存反而不会长久。但任意一方的失衡都会导致不可挽回的后果（即游戏最后差点实现的自我毁灭 / 扭曲的不断实验-->也不会出现多人的机器人代替实验），大概这也是V社对人工智能进化路的幻想吧

Johnson实验室有个警示牌提醒说时间穿越实验请不要和未来/过去的自己接触，刚好最近重温了遍永恒的终结，也算稍有了解，好

另外解谜过程中总有种想一直待实验室老老实实测试的念头，突然想起一句不知道哪个游戏里看到的话，大意是虽然人生来一片空白，但有谜题摆在眼前就会本能的解决掉。大概解谜真的是人类的本能之一……吧？

[h1]多人[/h1]
列表有大佬一起嘛/捂脸
